a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Reported paralytic polio cases and deaths, United States, 1910 to
The reported figures include both wild- and vaccine-derived type polio infections that occurred indigenously and as imported cases.
Data source: Our World In Data based on US Public Health Service; US Center for Disease Control; and WHO
